On the other hand, a community who have an opinion that the circumstances of each person's case and the motivation of doing misconduct action, agree to consider these reasons when deciding on the punishment. Every violation could be divided into some levels and the sanction could rely on each  case. For example, a group of robbers. They consist of a leader and members.
